layout.p: Written for the most part in two columns, 33 lines.

origin.p: The name of Bern (abbot of Reichenau from 1008 to 1048, who stayed in Fleury in 994 is present in this manuscript where it replaces that of Abbo in the example where it should illustrate the gap between new moon and the sun (duodecim fratribus distet Berno a suo abbate) on fol. 31rb.
